Level 1.name: Shadowstrike
Level 1.description: Infuse your sword with shadow energy for a devastating strike.

Level 2.name: Soulcleave
Level 2.description: Rip through your enemy's soul, causing lasting torment.

Branch 1.name: Abyssal Fury
Branch 1.description: Unleash the fury of the abyss, shattering your foes.

Branch 2.name: Dreadquake
Branch 2.description: Send shockwaves of dread through the earth, crippling your enemies.

Level 3.name: Darksteel Bastion
Level 3.description: Form an impenetrable barrier of darksteel, defying all harm.

Branch 1.name: Netherreaver
Branch 1.description: Summon a nightmarish entity to reap the souls of your foes.

Branch 2.name: Eclipseblade
Branch 2.description: Wield the Eclipseblade, a weapon of pure darkness.

Level 1.name: Shadowstep
Level 1.description: Vanish into the shadows and reappear behind your unsuspecting prey.

Level 2.name: Venomstrike
Level 2.description: Inject venom so potent that it corrodes your enemy from within.

Branch 1.name: Blacksurge
Branch 1.description: Channel the black surge of darkness, tearing through your target.

Branch 2.name: Nightshade Veil

Level 3.description: Ambush your foes with the power of ancient shadows, leaving them paralyzed.

Branch 1.name: Abyssal Daggerstorm
Branch 1.description: Unleash a storm of abyssal daggers, striking down all in your path.

Branch 2.name: Bloodmoon Whispers
Branch 2.description: Harness the eerie whispers of the bloodmoon, sowing fear in your enemies' hearts.

Level 1.name: Voidfire Bolt
Level 1.description: Launch a bolt of searing voidfire, consuming your target's essence.

Level 2.name: Astral Torrent
Level 2.description: Unleash a torrent of astral energy, bending reality to your will.

Branch 1.name: Eldritch Nexus
Branch 1.description: Form an eldritch nexus, drawing power from the realms beyond.

Branch 2.name: Starfall Cascade

Level 3.name: Eclipsewrath
Level 3.description: Summon the wrath of the eclipse, obliterating all in its shadow.

Branch 2.name: Abyssal Sunder

Level 1.description: Bloom the souls of your allies, restoring their vitality.

Level 2.name: Celestial Ward
Level 2.description: Erect a celestial ward, shielding your allies from harm.

Branch 1.name: Resonance of Renewal
Branch 1.description: Resonate the renewal of life, reviving fallen allies.

Branch 2.name: Elysian Mirage
Branch 2.description: Create an elysian mirage, confusing and disorienting your foes.

Level 3.name: Sacred Aegis
Level 3.description: Invoke the sacred aegis, a divine shield that wards against all harm.

Branch 1.name: Astral Resurrection
Branch 1.description: Resurrect fallen allies with the essence of the astral plane.

Branch 2.name: Heaven's Blessing
